column1: 1.0.A.jpg; A hand with blood on it reaches out. The hand belongs to Jin-woo
column2: who is holding a sword. His name is Sung Jin-woo
column3: and he is saying Haah. He is tired.

column4: covered in blood. The hunter was a member of The Hunter Guild
column5: and the guild's emblem was visible on the hunter's clothes.  The hunter grimaced in pain
column6: a bloody smile on their face
column7: and let out a low "Haah."  The hunter looked as if they were in a lot of pain
column8: but they were still smiling. They looked defiant and determined.
